ProjectTitle: Coevolution of epithelium in colorectal cancer: comprehensive characterization of progress-associated tumor heterogeneity in the colorectal cancer
InitialFeedbackHistory:
31/05/2023
Data: please also list the cells and/or samples that you will use, these are physical data, do these need special management such as storage under specific conditions? 
Will you only use human bodily material (cells, biopsies) covered by the ethical approval? If you also use patient data please indicate that you will process personal data, and check if this is registered; but since you have a recent ethical approval number this most likely included. For more information: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/studpers/index
Documentation/metadata: will you use protcols, sops, readme files etc for documentation? Metadata will also be generated with sequencing, maybe following MINSEQE standard? For more information: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata or ask the genomics core which metadata they provide.
Sharing: To ensure compliance with GDRP, please contact the data access committee (dac@uzleuven.be) before sharing any sequencing data
label: good with suggestions
